synopsis.text: One fateful day, Mirai Kakehashi, a young man burdened by a tragic past and a cruel present, decides to end his life. But instead of meeting his demise, he encounters Nasse, a celestial being who offers him a chance at redemption and happiness. Nasse bestows upon Mirai two extraordinary powers and reveals that he is one of the 13 chosen individuals vying to become the next God. With newfound hope and determination, Mirai embarks on a treacherous journey, battling against the other candidates in a divine competition that spans 999 days. As he navigates through this perilous world, Mirai must harness his new abilities and confront his dark past to seize the future he once thought impossible. In this thrilling and emotional tale, Mirai will discover that sometimes, to find true happiness, one must be willing to fight for it.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
